Name: Lifeline Module
Description:
Manufacturer: Greycat Industrial
Item Type: Mining Module (Active)

Shatter Damage: -90%
All Charge Rates: -90%
Heat Generation: +20%
Signature Size: +10%
Duration: 20 seconds
Uses: 5

Avoid a disaster with the Lifeline. Save yourself and your ship by using this module to significantly reduce damage caused by a shattering deposit.
